quest.name: Julia
Abide by the Rules
quest.text: Before resuming your adventure and exploration, you will need to register on the boarding list of the ship, and to sign its rules.
Coordinates: La Johanne, First Deck. (27,24)

quest.name: Julia
Abide by the rules
quest.text: Rules:
1. Do not bot. This means you are not allowed to use any automation programs or use keyboard tricks. Any away from keyboard activity will be considered as botting except standing still.
2. Do not spam. This also concerns trade spam.
3. Do not multibox. This means you cannot have more than one active character logged in at a time. You are not allowed to use more than one active client at a time to attack in groups.
4. Do not trashtalk, beg or use rude language in your character name or in the chat, except for roleplay purposes.
5. Do not speak any other language other than English in public areas. You are free to speak any language you want in private chats or when alone with friends.
6. Follow the social convention listed on the RFC1855 article.

quest.name: Magic Arpan
Speaking to Magic Arpan
quest.text: Magic Arpan is waiting for you. Go speak to him.
To speak to an NPC, click on him with your mouse or select him with then N key and then start to chat with him with the T key.
Coordinates: La Johanne, Second Deck. (39,33)

quest.name: Magic Arpan
Opening the Chest
quest.text: You need to open the chest and take the clothes from it.
To perform this action, click on the chest with your mouse or select it with the N key and then interact with it using the T key.
Coordinates: La Johanne, Second Deck. (41,37)

quest.name: Magic Arpan
Equip an Item
quest.text: Open your inventory by using the F3 key or use your mouse to select it in the menu of your client.
Once your inventory is open, you may equip the item by selecting it and clicking 'Equip'. Alternately, you can take off an equipment by clicking on 'Unequip'.
Some items have different effects. Some can heal you, some can be used as weapons or armors, and others can simply be sold for gold.

quest.name: Alige
Piberries Lover
quest.text: A mysterious stowaway needs your help. He hides at the bottom level of the ship, in the storage room.
It seems to be an urgent task, but he is afraid that you could be a sailor, so be ready!
Coordinates: La Johanne, Second Deck. (33,31)

quest.name: Alige
Piberries Lover
quest.text: Alige, the mysterious traveller, requests your help to find some food for him.
He in fact hides in a hole of the hallway, which leads to the ship's storage where he can reach for some barrels full of piberries.
It seems he is now sick of eating these berries all the time. That is why he would like you to find him other kinds of food and bring them to him.
Coordinates: La Johanne, Second Deck. (33,31)
Difficulty: ✩✩✩✩✩✩
Reward: A handful of Piberries.

quest.name: Peter
Ratto Extermination
quest.text: Peter needs your help to clean the bottom of the ship from some Rattos. Speak to him when you will have time to help him.
Coordinates: La Johanne, Second Deck. (60,35)

quest.name: Peter
Ratto Extermination
quest.text: Cleaning the bottom of the ship is a hard work, but Peter is offering you some gold for it.
Coordinates: La Johanne, Second Deck. (60,35)
Difficulty: ✭✩✩✩✩✩
Rewards: 500GP, 100EXP.

quest.name: Peter
Free Wash
quest.text: Peter asked you to empty freely the bottom of the ship.
It seems that you should again ask him this task, he may have something else to offer you...
Coordinates: La Johanne, Second Deck. (60,35)
Difficulty: ✭✩✩✩✩✩
Reward: Nothing.

quest.name: Peter
Free Wash
quest.text: Ask him about a reward for this task.
Coordinates: La Johanne, Second Deck. (60,35)

quest.name: Darlin
Treasure's Glints
quest.text: A weird light reflection annoys Darlin. He asked you to go and check what it could possibly be.
The light comes from the top of a cliff, west of the island. A road seems to go there.
Coordinates: Desert Island. (83,70)
Difficulty: ✩✩✩✩✩✩
Reward: Unknown.

quest.name: Darlin
Treasure's Glints
quest.text: The sailor was right. The light was the glint of the sun on a treasure chest.
Darlin seems to be waiting for you. You should tell him about the light.
Coordinates: Desert Island. (90,89)
Difficulty: ✩✩✩✩✩✩
Rewards: 400GP, Old Book.

quest.name: Couwan
Fish and Scams
quest.text: A sailor, who wasn't on Gugli's list, gave you his box full of food. He did not mention any reward, but he would like you to deliver this box to Gugli as soon as you can.
Coordinates: Desert Island. (85,108)
Difficulty: ✩✩✩✩✩✩
Reward: Unknown.

quest.name: Couwan
Fish and Scams
quest.text: Couwan is an awful, roguish person. No reward from him!
However, Gugli gave you some gold pieces and apologized for this unexpected task. He also warned you not to trust anyone.
Coordinates: Desert Island. (89,36)
Difficulty: ✩✩✩✩✩✩
Rewards: 50GP.

quest.name: Chef Gado
A Poisoned Recipe
quest.text: Chef Gado, wants you to collect 1 Piou Legs, 1 Croconut and 1 Aquada to prepare a special dish for Julia. A poisoned one.
Coordinates: La Johanne, Second Deck. (17,28)
Difficulty: ✩✩✩✩✩✩
